title: Confirmed: Tour de France Mastermind Rod Ellingworth Leaves Ineos Grenadiers
content:
Deputy principal quits Ineos Grenadiers amid exodus of top climbers, top boss Brailsford's future also in doubt.

Read the full article at Confirmed: Tour de France Mastermind Rod Ellingworth Leaves Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
